00026 template <class FRM>
00027 class XNMRSpectrumBase : public XSecondaryDriver
00028 {
00029     XNODE_OBJECT
00030 protected:
00031     XNMRSpectrumBase(const char *name, bool runtime,
00032                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00033                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00034                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00035                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00036 public:
00037     //! ususally nothing to do
00038     virtual ~XNMRSpectrumBase();
00039   
00040     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00041     virtual void showForms();
00042 protected:
00043 
00044     //! this is called when connected driver emit a signal
00045     //! unless dependency is broken
00046     //! all connected drivers are readLocked
00047     virtual void analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&);
00048     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00049     //! record is readLocked
00050     virtual void visualize();
00051     //! check connected drivers have valid time
00052     //! \return true if dependency is resolved
00053     virtual bool checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const;
00054 public:
00055     //! driver specific part below 
00056     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer> > &pulse() const {return m_pulse;}
00057 
00058     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &bandWidth() const {return m_bandWidth;}
00059     //! Deduce phase from data
00060     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &autoPhase() const {return m_autoPhase;}
00061     //! (Deduced) phase of echoes [deg.]
00062     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phase() const {return m_phase;}
00063     //! Spectrum solvers.
00064     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &solverList() const {return m_solverList;}
00065     /// FFT Window Function
00066     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &windowFunc() const {return m_windowFunc;}
00067     //! Changing width of time-domain image [%]
00068     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &windowWidth() const {return m_windowWidth;}
00069     
00070     //! records below.
00071     const std::deque<std::complex<double> > &wave() const {return m_wave;}
00072     //! averaged weights
00073     const std::deque<double> &weights() const {return m_weights;}
00074     //! resolution [Hz]
00075     double resRecorded() const {return m_resRecorded;}
00076     //! value of the first point [Hz]
00077     double minRecorded() const {return m_minRecorded;}
00078 protected:
00079     //! Records
00080     std::deque<double> m_weights;
00081     std::deque<std::complex<double> > m_accum;
00082 
00083     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnClear, m_lsnOnCondChanged;
00084     
00085     //! \return true to be cleared.
00086     virtual bool onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) const = 0;
00087     //! [Hz]
00088     virtual double getFreqResHint() const = 0;
00089     //! [Hz]
00090     virtual double getMinFreq() const = 0;
00091     //! [Hz]
00092     virtual double getMaxFreq() const = 0;
00093     //! [Hz]
00094     virtual double getCurrentCenterFreq() const = 0;
00095     virtual void afterFSSum() {}
00096     virtual void getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const = 0;
00097     virtual bool checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const = 0;
00098 private:
00099     //! Fourier Step Summation.
00100     void fssum();
00101 
00102     //! Records
00103     std::deque<std::complex<double> > m_wave;
00104 
00105     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer> > m_pulse;
00106  
00107     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_bandWidth;
00108     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> m_autoPhase;
00109     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_phase;
00110     const shared_ptr<XNode> m_clear;
00111     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_solverList;
00112     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_windowFunc;
00113     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_windowWidth;
00114     
00115     double m_resRecorded, m_minRecorded;
00116   
00117     xqcon_ptr m_conBandWidth;
00118     xqcon_ptr m_conPulse;
00119     xqcon_ptr m_conPhase, m_conAutoPhase;
00120     xqcon_ptr m_conClear, m_conSolverList, m_conWindowWidth, m_conWindowFunc;
00121 
00122     shared_ptr<FFT> m_ift;
00123     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolverWrapper> m_solver;
00124     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> m_peakPlot;
00125     std::vector<std::pair<double, double> > m_peaks;
00126     FFTSolver m_preFFT;
00127 
00128     void analyzeIFT();
00129     
00130     void onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00131 
00132     XTime m_timeClearRequested;
00133 protected:
00134     const qshared_ptr<FRM> m_form;
00135     const shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> m_statusPrinter;
00136     const shared_ptr<XWaveNGraph> m_spectrum;
00137     void onClear(const shared_ptr<XNode> &);
00138 };
